author: James Joyce
text: Dear Helen: I am sorry to have from you such bad news about your father. I had no idea he was so old or in such bad health. In these circumstances we find it quite natural you should stay with him. It would not be very human to do otherwise or for anybody to ask you to do so. I hope the case may not turn out to be so bad as the doctors say. In spite of this care I hope you will pass a pleasant summer there. Kind greetings from us both Babbo
